channel.title: Windows Server 2008 RC0
channel.description: RC0 of Windows Server 2008 was made available earlier this week.  I am currently installing it inside a Virtual PC and I have to say I'm impressed so far.  The installation process is much faster and smoother.  Also, it...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Tom+00:00
item.description: I'm pretty sure the sound service being disabled by default is not new to Sever 2008 as it was the same for 2003.
item.dc:creator: Tom
